item.description:
What: Cantando Juntos / Sing-A-Long

When: February 9, 2010 at 7 p.m./ 9 de febrero a las 7

Where:
Farmington Library
6 MONTEITH DR Community Room
Farmington, CT 06032
860.673.6791

Join us for a wonderful evening singing in Spanish just for fun. We will sing songs you probably know such as Bésame, Guantanamera, and La Bamba, as well as songs that may be new such as Gracias a La Vida, and classic Mexican songs such as Cielito Lindo, El Rey, La Malagueña, and La Llorona. Carmen and Karen will lead the songfest. We encourage you to come whether you are a good singer or not. This is a great way to enhance your love of Spanish musical culture, Spanish language, and have fun while you’re doing it!

Bring a SMALL amount of food to share. If you can, let us know in your RSVP what you'll bring. Hope to see you there! ¡Nos vemos pronto!

¿Preguntas? Questions? Contact Karen at kdwo543210@yahoo.com (860-922-7997 cell) or Kurt at gringo50@peru.com. Podrías escribirnos en ingles o español.

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Cantando Juntos
